entry.title: Destiny 2 Community Vocabulary 2022 Edition
entry.summary: Welcome to Destiny 2, guardian! The world of the guardians is always filled with mysterious, abstract lingo that are often used by fellow peers. Sometimes, you will encounter certain words used in the community forum, which might not be clear at first glance. Hence, I have compiled a list of the keywords used by the Desitny 2 community as of Janurary 2022, which is just before the Witch Queen expansion pack release.

entry.title: PUSH Festival, Art and Access Recap
entry.summary: The PUSH festival held an interesting conversation on Friday, Jan. 25th, 2019. The event was an expansive panel of discussion about arts, theatre and where accessibility and the disability community fit in. Does the experience of art performers have to be separate from diversity and inclusion?
